name: Potential Registry Persistence Attempt Via DbgManagedDebugger
description: Detects the addition of the "Debugger" value to the "DbgManagedDebugger" key in order to achieve persistence. Which will get invoked when an application crashes
author: frack113

detection.query:
selection: {"TargetObject|endswith": "\\Microsoft\\.NETFramework\\DbgManagedDebugger"}
filter: {"Details": "\"C:\\Windows\\system32\\vsjitdebugger.exe\" PID %d APPDOM %d EXTEXT \"%s\" EVTHDL %d"}

falsepositives: Legitimate use of the key to setup a debugger. Which is often the case on developers machines
